General.Name: Vietnam Dairy Products JSC
General.Description: Vietnam Dairy Products Joint Stock Company provides milk and dairy products in Vietnam and internationally. It processes, manufactures, and distributes milk cake, soya and fresh milk, refreshment drinks, bottled and powdered milk, nutritious powder, and other milk products. The company also offers plant-based milk, yogurt, condensed milk, ice-cream, and sugar, as well as fruit juices and cheese. In addition, it is involved in the trading of food technology, spare parts, equipment, materials, and chemicals; trading of real estate properties; owning or leasing land use rights; trading of warehouses and yards; provision of internal transportation by cars for manufacturing and consuming company's products; manufacture, sale, and distribution of beverages, grocery and processing foods, and roasted-ground-filtered and instant coffee; and manufacture and sale of plastic packaging products. Further, the company engages in the provision of healthcare clinic services; cattle raising and cultivation activities; manufacture and trading of products from tea and wine; and manufacture, breed, process, and trading of cattle and poultry products, as well as premix products for livestock. Additionally, it is involved in retailing sugar, milk and milk products, bread, jam, candy and products processed from cereal, flour, starch, and other food; and alcoholic drinks, carbonated and non-carbonated soft drinks, natural mineral water, and low-alcoholic or nonalcoholic wine and beer. The company was formerly known as Vietnam Milk Company and changed its name to Vietnam Dairy Products Joint Stock Company in November 2003. Vietnam Dairy Products Joint Stock Company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
